battleship.listeners

Class PlaceShipOnBoardListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleship.listeners.PlaceShipOnBoardListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class PlaceShipOnBoardListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener
    This class is a MouseListener, which is activated when the player is placing his ships on his board

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Construtor of PlaceShipOnBoardListener

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlaceShipOnBoardListener

        public PlaceShipOnBoardListener(Ship ship,
                                YourBoardPane myPane,
                                int row,
                                int col,
                                javax.swing.JButton selectedShip,
                                ShipsToBePlacedPane stbpPane,
                                ShipsPlacementFrame spFrame,
                                boolean selected)
        Construtor of PlaceShipOnBoardListener
        Parameters:
        ship: - the ship that the player wants to place on board
        myPane: - the player's board, where the ships are going to be placed
        row: - the row of the tile that its mouse listener is activated on the board
        col: - the column of the tile that its mouse listener is activated on the board
        selectedShip: - the exact tile on the ship that we chose
        stbpPane: - the JPanel where the ships that we can place on board are
        spFrame: - the frame where the player places his ships on the board
        selected: - helps us understand if the ship is already placed on board
